headline: Why the Market Dipped But Devon Energy (DVN) Gained Today
summary: Devon Energy (DVN) concluded the recent trading session at $35.21, signifying a +2.12% move from its prior day's close.

headline: Devon Energy Schedules Third-Quarter 2025 Earnings Release and Conference Call
summary: OKLAHOMA CITY, Sept. 24, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Devon Energy Corp. (NYSE: DVN) today announced it will report third-quarter 2025 results on Wednesday, Nov. 5, after the close of U.S. financial markets. The earnings release and presentation for the third-quarter 2025 results will be available on the company’s website at www.devonenergy.com. On Thursday, Nov. 6, the company will hold a conference call at 10 a.m. CDT (11 a.m. EDT), which will consist primarily of answers to questions from analyst

headline: Mizuho Lowers PT on Devon Energy Corporation (DVN) Stock to $40
summary: Devon Energy Corporation (NYSE:DVN) is one of the Most Promising Energy Stocks According to Wall Street Analysts. On September 15, Mizuho lowered price target on the company’s stock to $40 from $43, while maintaining an “Outperform” rating, as reported by The Fly. The firm decided to adjust ratings in the broader integrated oil space after updating the commodity price […]
